p: Expression plasmids for HA-, FLAG-, MyC-, RFP- or GFP-tagged UL42, HA-, FLAG- or RFP-tagged cGAS and its truncation mutants, HA-, FLAG- or RFP-tagged MITA and its truncation mutants were constructed by standard molecular biology techniques. Expression plasmids for HA- and FLAG-tagged MDA5, TRAPβ, TBK1 and IRF3, p62, LC3B, LC3A, IKKα, IKKβ, TRIM38, TRIM32, TRIM14, iRhom2 and the IFN-β promoter reporter plasmids were previously described [ 13, 15, 38, 55].
